languages.text: {n}Техножрица совершает сложное движение верхней половиной тела и мехадендритами. Ее пластика похожа скорее на движение механической марионетки, чем существа из плоти и крови.{/n} "Лорд-капитан! В отсутствие на корабле Главного технопровидца я, Мастер двигателя, вынуждена взять на себя часть священных протоколов, назначенных жрецам Омниссии старших рангов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Техножрица совершает сложное движение верхней половиной тела и механодендритами. Ее пластика похожа скорее на движение механической марионетки, чем существа из плоти и крови.{/n} "Лорд-капитан! В отсутствие на корабле старшего технопровидца я, Мастер двигателя, вынуждена взять на себя часть священных протоколов, назначенных жрецам Омниссии старших рангов".
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: {n}The Tech-Priest makes an elaborate gesture with her upper body and mechadendrites. Her movements bear a closer resemblance to a mechanical marionette than a creature of flesh and blood.{/n} "Lord Captain! In the absence of an Enginseer Prime on board, it falls to me as the Drivesmaster to carry out certain sacred protocols assigned to high-ranking priests of the Omnissiah."
languages.original_text: {n}Техножрица совершает сложное движение верхней половиной тела и мехадендритами. Ее пластика похожа скорее на движение механической марионетки, чем существа из плоти и крови.{/n} "Лорд-капитан! В отсутствие на корабле Главного технопровидца я, Мастер двигателя, вынуждена взять на себя часть священных протоколов, назначенных жрецам Омниссии старших рангов".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Tech-Priest makes an elaborate gesture with her upper body and mechadendrites. Her movements bear a closer resemblance to a mechanical marionette than a creature of flesh and blood.{/n} "Lord Captain! In the absence of a Chief Enginseer on board, it falls to me as the Engine Master to carry out certain sacred protocols assigned to high-ranking priests of the Omnissiah."
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

Her movements bear a closer resemblance to a mechanical marionette than a creature of flesh and blood.{/n} "Lord Captain! In the absence of an Enginseer Prime on board, it falls to me as the Drivesmaster to carry out certain sacred protocols assigned to high-ranking priests of the Omnissiah."
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: {n}技術司祭は彼女の上体と機械触手で複雑な身振りをした。彼女の動きは血と肉で作られた生物と言うよりは、機械仕掛けのマリオネットに近かった。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン！機関整備師主任の不在の折、万機神の上級司祭に割り当てられた神聖なるプロトコルを遂行する役割はドライブマスターである私の責務になるかと」
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest makes an elaborate gesture with her upper body and mechadendrites. Her movements bear a closer resemblance to a mechanical marionette than a creature of flesh and blood.{/n} "Lord Captain! In the absence of an Enginseer Prime on board, it falls to me as the Drivesmaster to carry out certain sacred protocols assigned to high-ranking priests of the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭は彼女の上体と機械触手で複雑な身振りをした。彼女の動きは血と肉で作られた生物と言うよりは、機械仕掛けのマリオネットに近かった。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン！機関整備師主任の不在の折、万機神の上級司祭に割り当てられた神聖なるプロトコルを遂行する役割はドライブマスターである私の責務になるかと」
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: {n}这位技术神甫用她的上半身和机械触须做了个复杂的姿势。她的动作看起来像个机械木偶，不太像有血有肉的生物。{/n}“舰长大人！主引擎先知不在场的情况下，我身为驱动大师，有责任执行欧姆尼塞亚的高阶神甫负责执行的神圣协议。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest makes an elaborate gesture with her upper body and mechadendrites. Her movements bear a closer resemblance to a mechanical marionette than a creature of flesh and blood.{/n} "Lord Captain! In the absence of an Enginseer Prime on board, it falls to me as the Drivesmaster to carry out certain sacred protocols assigned to high-ranking priests of the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位技术祭司用她的上半身和机械触须做了个复杂的姿势。她的动作看起来像个机械木偶，不太像有血有肉的生物。{/n}“舰长大人！主引擎先知不在场的情况下，我身为驱动大师，有责任执行欧姆尼塞亚的高阶祭司负责执行的神圣协议。”
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: {n}Die Techpriesterin führt mit ihrem Oberkörper und ihren Mechadendriten eine komplizierte Geste aus. Ihre Bewegungen ähneln eher einer mechanischen Marionette denn einer Kreatur aus Fleisch und Blut.{/n} "Lord Captain! Da es an Bord keinen Maschinenseher Primus gibt, muss ich als Triebwerksmeister gewisse heilige Protokolle ausführen, die hochrangigen Priestern des Omnissiah zugewiesen sind."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest makes an elaborate gesture with her upper body and mechadendrites. Her movements bear a closer resemblance to a mechanical marionette than a creature of flesh and blood.{/n} "Lord Captain! In the absence of an Enginseer Prime on board, it falls to me as the Drivesmaster to carry out certain sacred protocols assigned to high-ranking priests of the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Techpriesterin führt mit ihrem Oberkörper und ihren Mechadendriten eine komplizierte Geste aus. Ihre Bewegungen ähneln eher einer mechanischen Marionette denn einer Kreatur aus Fleisch und Blut.{/n} "Lord Captain! Da es an Bord keinen Maschinenseher Primus gibt, muss ich als Triebwerksmeister gewisse heilige Protokolle ausführen, die hochrangigen Priestern des Omnissiah zugewiesen sind."
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: {n}La technoprêtresse effectue un mouvement complexe avec le haut de son corps et ses mécadendrites. Sa gestuelle évoque davantage une marionnette mécanique qu'une créature de chair.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! En l'absence de technaugure primus à bord, c'est à moi, la maîtresse des machines, qu'il incombe d'exécuter certains protocoles sacrés assignés aux prêtres de haut rang de l'Omnimessie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest makes an elaborate gesture with her upper body and mechadendrites. Her movements bear a closer resemblance to a mechanical marionette than a creature of flesh and blood.{/n} "Lord Captain! In the absence of an Enginseer Prime on board, it falls to me as the Drivesmaster to carry out certain sacred protocols assigned to high-ranking priests of the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}La technoprêtresse effectue un mouvement complexe avec le haut de son corps et ses mécadendrites. Sa gestuelle évoque davantage une marionnette mécanique qu'une créature de chair.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! En l'absence de technaugure primus à bord, c'est à moi, la maîtresse des machines, qu'il incombe d'exécuter certains protocoles sacrés assignés aux prêtres de haut rang de l'Omnimessie. »
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: {n}La tecnosacerdotisa realiza un elaborado gesto con su tronco superior y sus mecadendritas. Sus movimientos son más propios de una marioneta mecánica que de una criatura de carne y hueso.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán! En ausencia de un visioingeniero primero a bordo, recae sobre mí como maestra de motores la responsabilidad de oficiar ciertos protocolos sagrados asignados al clero de alto rango del Omnissiah».
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest makes an elaborate gesture with her upper body and mechadendrites. Her movements bear a closer resemblance to a mechanical marionette than a creature of flesh and blood.{/n} "Lord Captain! In the absence of an Enginseer Prime on board, it falls to me as the Drivesmaster to carry out certain sacred protocols assigned to high-ranking priests of the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}La tecnosacerdotisa realiza un elaborado gesto con su tronco superior y sus mecadendritas. Sus movimientos son más propios de una marioneta mecánica que de una criatura de carne y hueso.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán! En ausencia de un visioingeniero primero a bordo, recae sobre mí como maestra de motores la responsabilidad de oficiar ciertos protocolos sagrados asignados al clero de alto rango del Omnissiah».
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip, bedeninin üst kısmını ve mekadentritlerini kullanarak gösterişli bir jestte bulunuyor. Hareketleri, et ve kemikten oluşan bir canlıdan ziyade mekanik bir kuklayı çağrıştırıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan! Hermesih'in üst düzey rahiplerine atanan ve belirli kutsal protokollerin yürütülmesi sorumluluğu, Gemide Başmühedyum bulunmadığından Motor Üstadı olarak bana kalıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest makes an elaborate gesture with her upper body and mechadendrites. Her movements bear a closer resemblance to a mechanical marionette than a creature of flesh and blood.{/n} "Lord Captain! In the absence of an Enginseer Prime on board, it falls to me as the Drivesmaster to carry out certain sacred protocols assigned to high-ranking priests of the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip, üst bedenini ve mekadentritlerini kullanarak gösterişli bir jestte bulunuyor. Hareketleri, et ve kemikten oluşan bir canlıdan ziyade, mekanik bir kuklayı çağrıştırıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan! Gemide Başmühedyum bulunmadığı müddetçe, Hermesih'in üst düzey rahiplerine atanan ve belirli kutsal protokollerin yürütülmesi sorumluluğu, Motor Üstadı olarak bana kalıyor."
traits.speaker: EngineMaster
